forest_road_encounters.description: Encounters one might find on a path through the edges of a forest.

deep_woods_encounters.description: Deeper into the woods, dangers and mysteries abound.

nothing_common.description: The road is quiet. For now.

nothing_less_common.description: The forest is eerily silent around you.

wolf_pack_easy.name: A Few Hungry Wolves
wolf_pack_easy.description: A small pack of wolves eyes you, clearly hungry.

traveling_merchant_rare.name: Traveling Merchant
traveling_merchant_rare.description: You meet a merchant on the road, his cart laden with goods.

wolf_pack_medium.name: Wolf Pack
wolf_pack_medium.description: A larger, more coordinated pack of wolves.

ancient_spirit_puzzle.name: Whispering Spirit
ancient_spirit_puzzle.description: An ancient spirit guards this part of the woods. It offers a riddle.

success.message: The spirit seems pleased and offers a boon.

failure.message: The spirit sighs, disappointed, and fades away.

hidden_grove_resource.name: Hidden Grove
hidden_grove_resource.description: You stumble upon a small, serene grove with rare herbs.

skillCheck.successMessage: You identify and gather several potent herbs.
skillCheck.failureMessage: You find some common plants, but nothing of significant value.
